subject: Museums

Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Don Larsen’s decision to auction his 1956 perfect game uniform, which had been on display at the San Diego Hall of Champions, could have broad implications for museums.
snippet: Don Larsen’s decision to auction his 1956 perfect game uniform, which had been on display at the San Diego Hall of Champions, could have broad implications for museums.
